reviewText: The show was interesting from looking at the DVD's. I didn't get the show where I live. I thought from all the reviews I had heard about it, it would be something that I would learn from and enjoy. I was not that impressed. It did have a lot of different things they talked about, so you have a choice to watch the whole thing or take a break and then come back and watch more. However it was worth what I paid for it.
Lost my PDTV recordings when the TIVO hard drive crashed. Great deal very good quality; fast delivery too. I give it a strong BUY.
